question: Which nation houses "Project 635 Canal"?
explanation: Project 635 Canal, also known as Irtysh-Karamay-Urumqi canal, is located in the Xinjiang Uighur Autonomous Region of China. This canal transfers water from the Irtysh River into several dry and endorheic basins of the north-central Xinjiang. The excess water of Burqin River, a tributary of Irtysh River, which usually flows into the Arctic Ocean, can be transferred for the irrigation and general use in water-scarce areas.
